attributeDefinition: site ID containing of four plots

comment: Infos from the Grassworks project (see Temperton et al. 2025, https://doi.org/10.32942/X2192S)

attributeDefinition: ID of the ecoregion sensu Dinerstein et al. (2017)
name of the eco.id sensu Dinerstein et al. (2017)
x coordinate of id.plot / WGS84 / EPSG 4326
y coordinate of id.plot / WGS84 / EPSG 4327
Expert judgement about the hydrological site conditions
comment: Infos from the Grassworks project (see Temperton et al. 2025, https://doi.org/10.32942/X2192S)

attributeDefinition: Restoration method which was applied to the id.site
factor: cus = cultivar seed mixture / mag = management adaptation / res = regional seed mixture / dih = direct harvesting
comment: Infos from the Grassworks project (see Temperton et al. 2025, https://doi.org/10.32942/X2192S)

attributeDefinition: How long ago to the obs.year is the restoration activity?
comment: Infos from the Grassworks project (see Temperton et al. 2025, https://doi.org/10.32942/X2192S)

attributeDefinition: The use of the site before restoration was applied
comment: Infos from the Grassworks project (see Temperton et al. 2025, https://doi.org/10.32942/X2192S)

attributeDefinition: The total estimated cover of the graminoid species (Poacease/Cyperaceae/Juncaceae)
comment: Infos from the Grassworks project (see Temperton et al. 2025, https://doi.org/10.32942/X2192S)

attributeDefinition: The total estimated cover of the forb species without legumes
comment: Infos from the Grassworks project (see Temperton et al. 2025, https://doi.org/10.32942/X2192S)

attributeDefinition: The total estimated cover of legumes (Fabaceae)
comment: Infos from the Grassworks project (see Temperton et al. 2025, https://doi.org/10.32942/X2192S)

attributeDefinition: The graminoid-forb ratio. Legumes are added to the forbs part
comment: Infos from the Grassworks project (see Temperton et al. 2025, https://doi.org/10.32942/X2192S)
